title: Up-to-date Software: How to Defend Yourself Against Malicious Users (Internet Marketing Inc)
text: ( Source : Internet Marketing Inc) Outdated Software (e.g. Plugins and the WordPress Core ) Background : software vendors release regular updates for their products. Some of these updates are feature updates and others are related to security.
